Articles.Content:
Hi all, Just dropping in to introduce myself. I am pretty new to KSP. I played it a couple years ago and landed on the Mun once. Now, I'm back and enjoying all of the changes to the game and re-acclimating myself to crashing rockets with style. Happy to be here, and thank you for all of the good advice about the game that you all post!

,

Neves

Hello Neves, and welcome to the forums!

Good to have you aboard. Don't re-acclimate yourself too much. Version 1.0.5 is set to drop soon .

Happy landings!

Welcome aboard pilot.....apart from the game being amazing, this forum is also....ive learnt so much from here.

I have to admit that I come here at least 10 times a day....its that good

Well, happy building, happy flying and all the best when it comes to solving a problem you may have in your mission

Heya Neves,

I'm quite new too. Picked up the game for the 1st time lat month...

Welcome aboard from a fellow Bottle Rocketeer I've found everyone here to be really welcoming and helpful...it's a cool little corner of the interwebs!
Welcome I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoy the game:D
Welcome! As said before, 1.0.5 is coming soon with a lot of nice features.
Welcome! I'm late to the party, but better late than never. Good to see that you're already an active member of the community!
